content.query:
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

ALTER PROC [dbo].[UpsertDiagnosisCodes] AS
BEGIN

UPDATE icd SET IcdCodeId = icdStage.IcdCodeId,
IcdCode= icdStage.IcdCode,
IcdDescription= icdStage.IcdDescription
FROM
DimDiagnosisCodes icd
JOIN
Load.DiagnosisCodes icdStage ON
icd.IcdCodeId = icdStage.IcdCodeId

insert into DimDiagnosisCodes (IcdCodeId,IcdCode,IcdDescription)
SELECT icdStage.IcdCodeId, 
icdStage.IcdCode, 
icdStage.IcdDescription
FROM
Load.DiagnosisCodes icdStage 
LEFT JOIN 
DimDiagnosisCodes icd ON icd.IcdCodeId = icdStage.IcdCodeId
WHERE icd.IcdCodeId IS NULL


--Insert the log details into Load.LogDetails table
DECLARE @logId INT
SELECT @logId = LogID FROM [Load].[Log] WHERE FileType = 'DiagnosisCodes' 

INSERT INTO [Load].[LogDetails] (LogId,CompletedDate)
select @logId,  GETDATE()

--update load.Log table
UPDATE [Load].[Log] SET LastUpdatedDate = GETDATE() WHERE FileType = 'DiagnosisCodes' 


END
GO
